name: sop-enforcer
description: Comprehensive SOP governance enforcement with realtime monitoring, violation tracking, and interactive SOP development
author: Strategos (AI Chief of Staff)

features.realtime_monitoring: Monitors all tool uses for SOP violations
features.violation_tracking: Automatic violation entry creation with session card updates
features.interactive_qa: Guides sessions through SOP development with Q&A
features.log_analysis: Analyzes logs/responses for unauthorized documentation attempts
features.session_governance: Enforces 208-SOP authority matrix per session type
